query:
UPDATE project_repositories
               SET name = $2,
                   updated_at = datetime('now', 'subsec')
               WHERE id = $1
               RETURNING id as "id!: Uuid",
                         project_id as "project_id!: Uuid",
                         name,
                         git_repo_path,
                         created_at as "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>",
                         updated_at as "updated_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
